description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a Tic Tac Toe application, including styles for light and dark themes, as well as layout and animations for the application's components.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the application.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for the links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button.
